title: Prohibits the Triborough bridge and tunnel authority from imposing toll on intra-borough bridges
summary: Prohibits the Triborough bridge and tunnel authority from imposing a toll or fee for the use of any intra-borough bridge.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1952

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 14, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  KRUGER -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Transportation

       AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation  to  prohibiting
         the imposition of a toll on intra-borough bridges

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 553 of the public authorities  law  is  amended  by
    2  adding a new subdivision 12-a to read as follows:
    3    12-A.  NOTWITHSTANDING ANY OTHER PROVISION OF LAW, THE AUTHORITY SHALL
    4  NOT IMPOSE A TOLL OR FEE FOR THE USE OF ANY INTRA-BOROUGH BRIDGE.
    5    S 2. This act shall take effect on the sixtieth  day  after  it  shall
    6  have become a law.







        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07157-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to prohibiting the imposition of a toll on intra-borough bridges
